title: State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 15 (Isr
description:
State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 15 (Israel 3):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Abuelaish - I Shall Not Hate; a Gaza Doctor's Journey (2010)

-  Alam - Israeli Exceptionalism; the Destabilizing Logic of Zionism (2009)

-  Aruri - Palestinian Refugees; the Right of Return (2001)

-  Bargouti - Boycott Divestment Sanctions; the Global Struggle for Palestinian Rights (2011)

-  Benvenisti et al (Eds.) - Israel and the Palestinian Refugees (2007)

-  Bickerton - The Arab-Israeli Conflict; a History (2009)

-  Black - The Transfer Agreement; the Dramatic Story of the Pact Between the Third Reich and Jewish Palestine (2009)

-  Blumenthal - Goliath; Life and Loathing in Greater Israel (2013)

-  Bunton - The Palestinian Israeli Conflict; a Very Short Introduction (2013)

-  Butler - Parting Ways; Jewishness and the Critique of Zionism (2012)

-  Carter - Palestine; Peace Not Apartheid (2006)

-  Cohn-Sherbok & El-Alami - The Palestine-Israeli Conflict; a Beginner's Guide (2001)

-  Cook, Hanieh & Kay - Stolen Youth; the Politics of Israel's Detention of Palestinian Children (2004)

-  Finkelstein - Knowing Too Much; Why the American Jewish Romance with Israel Is Coming to an End (2012)

-  Finkelstein - This Time We Went Too Far; Truth & Consequences of the Gaza Invasion (2010)

-  Finkelstein & Birn - A Nation on Trial; the Goldhagen Thesis and Historical Truth (1998)

-  Gorenberg - The Unmaking of Israel (2011)

-  Hoffman - Judaism Discovered From Its Own Texts (2008)

-  Hoffman - Judaism's Strange Gods; Origins of Talmudic Racial Hatred Exposed (2000)

-  HRW - Forget About Him, He's Not Here; Israel's Control of Palestinian Residency in the West Bank and Gaza (2012)

-  HRW - I Lost Everything; Israel's Unlawful Destruction of Property during Operation Cast Lead (2010)

-  HRW - Separate and Unequal; Israel's Discriminatory Treatment of Palestinians in the Occupied Palestinian Territories (2010)

-  Jones & Peterson (Eds.) - Israel's Clandestine Diplomacies (2013)

-  Kanaaneh - A Doctor in Galilee; the Life and Struggle of a Palestinian in Israel (2008)

-  Kattan - From Coexistence to Conquest; International Law and the Origins of the Arab-Israeli Conflict, 1891-1949 (2009)

-  Kimmerling & Migdal - The Palestinian People; a History (2003)

-  Massad - The Persistence of the Palestinian Question; Essays on Zionism and the Palestinians (2006)

-  Meydani - The Anatomy of Human Rights in Israel; Constitutional Rhetoric and State Practice (2014)

-  Nusseibeh - What is a Palestinian State Worth (2011)

-  Pappe - The Idea of Israel; a History of Power and Knowledge (2014)

-  Ruebner - Shattered Hopes; Obama's Failure to Broker Israeli-Palestinian Peace (2013)

-  Sand - The Invention of the Jewish People (2009)

-  Weizman - Hollow Land; Israel's Architecture of Occupation (2007)

-  Weizman - The Least of All Possible Evils; Humanitarian Violence from Arendt to Gaza (2011)

-  Zertal - Israel's Holocaust and the Politics of Nationhood (2005)
